src/kvilib/config/kvi_debug.h File Reference

This file contains the definition of the debug macros; You can enable ALL the debugging output by uncommenting the line that defines _KVI_DEBUG_CHECK_RANGE_. More...

Defines

#define __ASSERT(_expr)
#define __range_invalid(_expr)
#define __range_valid(_expr)

Detailed Description

This file contains the definition of the debug macros; You can enable ALL the debugging output by uncommenting the line that defines _KVI_DEBUG_CHECK_RANGE_.

Author:
Szymon Stefanek
